function.description: Calculate the least common multiple (LCM) of two numbers.
function.name: calculate_lcm

function.description: Calculate the length between two points given their coordinates.
function.name: calculate_length

A.description: The coordinates of point A as a tuple (x_A, y_A).

C.description: The coordinates of point C as a tuple (x_C, y_C).

function.description: Calculate the division of a number by the result of another expression and multiply by a third number.
function.name: calculate_division_expression

expression.description: An expression to evaluate for the denominator.

multiplier.description: A number to multiply the result by.

function.description: Calculate the interior angles of a pentagon given the measurements of the known angles and the relationships among them.
function.name: calculate_pentagon_angle

angles.description: A dictionary containing the measures of known angles.

function.description: Calculate the diagonal length of a rectangle given its length and width.
function.name: calculate_rectangle_diagonal

function.description: Calculate the angles of a pentagon given relationships between its angles more generally.
function.name: calculate_pentagon_angles_optimized

angles.description: A dictionary containing the measures of angles as key-value pairs.

function.description: Calculate the interior angles of a pentagon based on given angle relationships.
function.name: calculate_pentagon_angles

A.description: The measure of angle A in degrees.

B.description: The measure of angle B in degrees.

additional_angle.description: An additional angle in degrees with respect to C.

function.description: Calculate the slope of a line given two points (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).
function.name: calculate_slope

x1.description: The x-coordinate of the first point.

x2.description: The x-coordinate of the second point.

y1.description: The y-coordinate of the first point.

y2.description: The y-coordinate of the second point.

function.description: Calculate the remainder of a division operation.
function.name: calculate_remainder

function.description: Calculate the number of prime numbers in a given range.
function.name: calculate_sum_of_primes

end.description: The ending number of the range.

start.description: The starting number of the range.

function.description: Calculate the square root of a given number and return it in decimal format.
function.name: calculate_square_root

number.description: The number for which to calculate the square root.

function.description: Calculate the result of a fractional arithmetic expression.
function.name: calculate_fractional_expression

function.description: Calculate the area of a right triangle given the lengths of the two legs.
function.name: calculate_area_of_right_triangle

function.description: Calculate and return all angles of a pentagon based on angle relationships.
function.name: calculate_pentagon_angle_measurements

angles.description: A dictionary containing the measures of angles A, B and additional_angle.

function.description: Calculate the probability based on favorable outcomes and total outcomes.
function.name: calculate_probability

output_fraction.description: Indicate whether the output should be in fractional form.

function.description: Calculate and return all angles of a polygon based on given angle relationships.
function.name: calculate_and_return_angle_measures

angles.description: A dictionary containing the measures of angles in the polygon.
